column6: "KILLED, NOT DEAD," PART 1 Guest-starring Deadpool!  Herman Goncharenko lies at death's door, wasting away of cancer, but someone wants him killed, not dead.  Someone desperate enough to hire a certain mouthy mercenary to do the job.  Gonchrenko's only hope just might be the reformed Moon Knight - if he's able to withstand the force of nature known as Deadpool, and if Goncharenko is, indeed, worth saving. Parental Advisory ...$2.99
